title: Repeals provisions of the administrative code of the city of New York relating to the eviction of tenants where buildings are to be demolished or substantially altered
summary: Repeals provisions of the administrative code of the city of NY relating to more readily permitting the eviction of tenants where buildings are to be demolished or substantially altered.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1720

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 11, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. ROSENTHAL, GLICK, GOTTFRIED, V. LOPEZ -- Multi-
         Sponsored by -- M. of A. COOK, FARRELL, O'DONNELL, ORTIZ -- read  once
         and referred to the Committee on Housing

       AN  ACT  to repeal paragraph 6 of subdivision b of section 26-408 of the
         administrative code of the city of New York relating to  evictions  of
         tenants

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph 6 of subdivision  b  of  section  26-408  of  the
    2  administrative code of the city of New York is REPEALED.
    3    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02270-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph 6 of subdivision b of section 26-408 of the administrative code of the city of New York relating to evictions of tenants
